title: Jonas Neubert
text:
Jonas Neubert is a research intern at Neuropsychology and Psychopharmacology research department of the Faculty of Psychology and Neuroscience at Maastricht University.
You can reach me at jonas at neubert dot eu

title: Jonas Neubert
text:

Maastricht University, Netherlands | Research Master in Cognitive and Clinical Neuroscience M.Sc. Drug Development and Neurohealth | Sept 2021 - August 2023
Maastricht University, Netherlands | University College Maastricht B.A Liberal Arts and Sciences | Sept 2016 - August 2021
